channel.title: Partnership with Intel on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Partnership with Intel on FinanClub

item.title: 1122 ERIC
item.description: score:1122 Chances: Ericsson has won the 2023 CRN Tech Innovator Awards for its NetCloud Private Networks solution, which may boost the company’s reputation and market presence. Ericsson’s partnership with Intel to develop a custom chip for 5G networking gear using advanced manufacturing technology could enhance the company’s 5G offerings and competitiveness.
